lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant says he's happy new Washington coach Scott Brooks is back in the NBA a year after being let go by Oklahoma City.

headline.print_headline: Durant: Happy Ex-Coach Brooks Back in NBA, Focused on Mavs
headline.main: Durant: Happy Ex-Coach Brooks Back in NBA, Focused on Mavs

snippet: Kevin Durant says he's happy new Washington coach Scott Brooks is back in the NBA a year after being let go by Oklahoma City....
